Package managerpro.Controller

Class MainInformationController

java.lang.Object
managerpro.Controller.MainInformationController
public class MainInformationController
extends java.lang.Object
MainInformationController class is handles the events and data related to the main information panel. An instance of this class is created when the main information panel is loaded.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.control.Label activeReservationsAmountLabel
    Label-node to display the amount of active reservations.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField clientNameField
    Textfield-node for inserting the clients name.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField clientPhoneField
    Textfield-node for inserting the clients phone number.
    private Controller controller
    Controller-variable that is passed in to Main Information Controller for later use.
    private javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> hourItems
    ObservableList to hold all the items displayed by ComboBox- nodes.
    private Model model
    The Model which is used to fetch data from the database.
    private javafx.scene.control.DatePicker reservationDatePicker
    Datepicker-node for inserting the date of the reservation.
    private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> reservationTimeFrom
    ComboBox of the type String to hold the starting times of the reservation.
    private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> reservationTimeTo
    ComboBox of the type String to hold the ending times of the reservation.
    private TablesEntity selectedTable
    TablesEntity-type variable into which the currently selected table is stored.
    private javafx.scene.control.Label selectedTableLabel
    Label-node for displaying the currently selected table.
    private int selectedTableSize
    Integer-type variable that holds the currently selected table size.

    Button-node for selecting the table size.

    Button-node for selecting the table size.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button tableSize6Button
    Button-node for selecting the table size.

    ArrayList to hold all the table size buttons.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainInformationController

      public MainInformationController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize-method executes the needed setup functions when the FXML-file is loaded. 1.Populating ComboBoxes. 2.Populating tableSizeButtons-arraylist. 3. Initiating the listeners. 4. Disabling past dates from the date picker.

    • setModel

      public void setModel​(Model model)
      Sets the model of this class.
      Parameters:
      model - Model created at MainController

    • setController

      public void setController​(Controller controller)
      Sets the controller of this class.
      Parameters:
      controller - controller for this class

    • selectTableSize

      public void selectTableSize​(javafx.event.Event event)
      Handles the event of selecting a table size.
      Parameters:
      event - JavaFX Event

    • fetchTable

      public void fetchTable()
      Handles the event of clicking the "Fetch table"- button in the interface. Evaluates the user input, checking that there is no errors in date or time. Gets the the tables from the model that match the criteria. Sets one of the available tables as selected.

    • saveReservation

      public void saveReservation()
      Handles the event of saving a reservation. Evaluates user input and checks that there is no empty data fields. Fires a confirmation dialog before saving the reservation.

    • initListeners

      public void initListeners()
      Listener that checks if the value in date picker changes. If the date value has changed, resets the selected table for re-evaluation.

    • openAllReservationsPanel

      public void openAllReservationsPanel()
      Calls for the controller- object to open reservations panel for all reservations. Fired when user clicks on the "See All Reservations"-button.

    • updateSelectedTableLabel

      public void updateSelectedTableLabel()
      Updates the selected table label.

    • confirmReset

      public void confirmReset()
      Displays a confirmation dialog before calling resetForm-method.

    • updateActiveReservationsLabel

      public void updateActiveReservationsLabel()
      Updates the active reservations amount label.

    • resetForm

      public void resetForm()
      Resets all selected values and clears the values in the form.

    • displaySaveDialog

      public void displaySaveDialog()
      Displays an information dialog.

    • displayErrorDialog

      public void displayErrorDialog​(java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String contentText)
      Displays a custom error dialog
      Parameters:
      headerText - - String parameter to be displayed as header.
      contentText - - String parameter to be displayed as content.

    • displayInformationDialog

      public void displayInformationDialog​(java.lang.String headerText, java.lang.String contentText)
      Displays a custom information dialog.
      Parameters:
      headerText - - String parameter to be displayed as header.
      contentText - - String parameter to be displayed as content.
